verses.verse: And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> an altar <WH4196> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>; the altar <WH4196> shall be foursquare <WH7251> <WH8803>: and the height <WH6967> thereof shall be three <WH7969> cubits <WH520>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> the shofars <WH7161> of it upon the four <WH702> corners <WH6438> thereof: his shofars <WH7161> shall be of the same: and thou shalt overlay <WH6823> <WH8765> it with brass <WH5178>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> his pans <WH5518> to receive his ashes <WH1878> <WH8763>, and his shovels <WH3257>, and his basons <WH4219>, and his fleshhooks <WH4207>, and his firepans <WH4289>: all the vessels <WH3627> thereof thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> of brass <WH5178>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> for it a grate <WH4345> of network <WH4639> of brass <WH5178>; and upon the net <WH7568> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8804> four <WH702> brasen <WH5178> rings <WH2885> in the four <WH702> corners <WH7098> thereof.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> it under the compass <WH3749> of the altar <WH4196> beneath <WH4295>, that the net <WH7568> may be even to <WH5704> the midst <WH2677> of the altar <WH4196>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> staves <WH905> for the altar <WH4196>, staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlay <WH6823> <WH8765> them with brass <WH5178>.
And the staves <WH905> shall be put <WH935> <WH8717> into the rings <WH2885>, and the staves <WH905> shall be upon the two <WH8147> sides <WH6763> of the altar <WH4196>, to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> it.
Hollow <WH5014> <WH8803> with boards <WH3871> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> it: as it was shewed <WH7200> <WH8689> thee in the mount <WH2022>, so shall they make <WH6213> <WH8799> it.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8804> the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle <WH4908>: for the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward <WH8486> there shall be hangings <WH7050> for the court <WH2691> of fine twined <WH7806> <WH8716> linen <WH8336> of an hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> long <WH753> for one <WH259> side <WH6285>:

And the twenty <WH6242> pillars <WH5982> thereof and their twenty <WH6242> sockets <WH134> shall be of brass <WH5178>; the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> shall be of silver <WH3701>.

And likewise for the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> in length <WH753> there shall be hangings <WH7050> of an hundred <WH3967> cubits long <WH753>, and his twenty <WH6242> pillars <WH5982> and their twenty <WH6242> sockets <WH134> of brass <WH5178>; the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> of silver <WH3701>.

And for the breadth <WH7341> of the court <WH2691> on the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> shall be hangings <WH7050> of fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>: their pillars <WH5982> ten <WH6235>, and their sockets <WH134> ten <WH6235>.
And the breadth <WH7341> of the court <WH2691> on the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> eastward <WH4217> shall be fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>.
The hangings <WH7050> of one side <WH3802> of the gate shall be fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> cubits <WH520>: their pillars <WH5982> three <WH7969>, and their sockets <WH134> three <WH7969>.
And on the other <WH8145> side <WH3802> shall be hangings <WH7050> fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> cubits: their pillars <WH5982> three <WH7969>, and their sockets <WH134> three <WH7969>.

And for the gate <WH8179> of the court <WH2691> shall be an hanging <WH4539> of twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>, of blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine twined <WH7806> <WH8716> linen <WH8336>, wrought with needlework <WH7551> <WH8802> <WH4639>: and their pillars <WH5982> shall be four <WH702>, and their sockets <WH134> four <WH702>.

All the pillars <WH5982> round about <WH5439> the court <WH2691> shall be filleted <WH2836> <WH8794> with silver <WH3701>; their hooks <WH2053> shall be of silver <WH3701>, and their sockets <WH134> of brass <WH5178>.

The length <WH753> of the court <WH2691> shall be an hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> fifty <WH2572> every where <WH2572>, and the height <WH6967> five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> of fine twined <WH7806> <WH8716> linen <WH8336>, and their sockets <WH134> of brass <WH5178>.

All the vessels <WH3627> of the tabernacle <WH4908> in all the service <WH5656> thereof, and all the pins <WH3489> thereof, and all the pins <WH3489> of the court <WH2691>, shall be of brass <WH5178>.

And thou shalt command <WH6680> <WH8762> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that they bring <WH3947> <WH8799> thee pure <WH2134> oil <WH8081> olive <WH2132> beaten <WH3795> for the light <WH3974>, to cause the Menorah <WH5216> to burn <WH5927> <WH8687> always <WH8548>.

In the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> without <WH2351> the vail <WH6532>, which is before the testimony <WH5715>, Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall order <WH6186> <WH8799> it from evening <WH6153> to morning <WH1242> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> unto their generations <WH1755> on the behalf of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
